nodes.text: Following the Battle of Jakku, the New Republic opened a new flight academy on the planet Hosnian Prime. The starfighter ace pilot Captain Wedge Antilles was made the chief instructor of the academy. The New Republic pilot Norra Wexley also found a job as an instructor there while her son Temmin Wexley became one of its first students.

The Hosnian Prime flight academy was first mentioned by the character Conder Kyl during a conversation with Temmin and Norra on page 413 of Chuck Wendig's 2017 novel Aftermath: Empire's End. However, Norra names the Academy as the Corellian Academy on page 417. It is unclear whether this was a continuity error in the book.
